Articles.Content:
So I was looking for an equation that I can solve my apo and peri using velocity and altitude and I found this equation

but I have to know the zenith angle and I don't know how to find that in KSP... please help ? here is the link to the website with the equation.

http://www.braeunig.us/space/orbmech.htm
Read it off from the navball. It won't be super precise but hopefully you'll get a good estimate.
Thanks, I thought of that and I was hoping there was a better way but I haven't though of any other than using maying engineer or protractor...
I think it`s 42. (Nothing to see here, move along...)
Mechjeb or some mod might include the information you need.
If you're using kOS you can convert the attitude vector to the zenith angle with some basic trigonometry.
